__prompts__.tagline: Write a clever and witty tagline for the software project. Do not use the name of the project in the tagline.  Make it no more than six words.
__prompts__.emoji_tagline: Represent the tagline, using only emoji. Ideally no more than 3 emoji
__prompts__.features: List the features of the software project.  Do not use the name of the project in the features.  Make it no more than 6 features.
__prompts__.software_type: Select the type of interface that this project will have.  Example: 'CLI, GUI, REST API, Web App, python package'
__prompts__.project_structure: Create a bullet point markdown list of the code files found in this project and what they do.  Example: '- `validators.py`: Contains the validation functions.'
__prompts__.python_packages: Make a guess as to what two python packages this software would use. Make your response a comma-separated list.  Example: 'requests, fastapi, openai'
__prompts__.example_usage: Write a short example of how to use the software project. Don't include installation steps. Make it a single code example
